com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider.filter

Class SimpleIndexInclusionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider.filter.SimpleIndexInclusionFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataProviderFilter

    public class SimpleIndexInclusionFilter
extends Object
implements DataProviderFilter
    This filter implementation filters data based on the indexes set. Indexes can be in the format of
    • "1, 2, 3" for individual indexes.
    • "1-4, 6-8, 9-10" for ranges of indexes.
    • "1, 3, 5-7, 10, 12-14" for mixing individual and range of indexes.
    This filter always collects data whose data index is in given filterIndexes. The indexes corresponds to the invocation sequence for the test method run for each supplied data, and so is 1-based.
    See Also:
    org.testng.annotations.Test.invocationCount

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleIndexInclusionFilter

        public SimpleIndexInclusionFilter(String filterIndexes)
        Initializes indexes to be included for filter using a conforming string.
        Parameters:
        filterIndexes - - sets the indexes string that will be used in the filtering. It is in the format of:
        • "1, 2, 3" for individual indexes.
        • "1-4, 6-8, 9-10" for ranges of indexes.
        • "1, 3, 5-7, 10, 12-14" for mixing individual and range of indexes.

      • SimpleIndexInclusionFilter

        public SimpleIndexInclusionFilter(int[] indexes)
        Initializes indexes to be included for filter using an array of indexes.
        Parameters:
        indexes - - sets the indexes that will be used in the filtering. It is an array of integers starting from 1.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public boolean filter(Object data)
        This function identifies whether the object falls in the filtering criteria or not based on the indexes provided. For this we are using the invocation count for comparing the index.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface DataProviderFilter
        Parameters:
        data - the object to be filtered.
        Returns:
        boolean - true if object falls in the filter criteria.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the indexes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
